content.question: Use each of the following observations to justify the claim that glycolysis first occurred in a common ancestor of all living organisms.Nearly all existing organisms perform glycolysis.Glycolysis occurs under anaerobic conditions.Glycolysis occurs only in the cytosol.

frqParts.text: Use each of the following observations to justify the claim that glycolysis first occurred in a common ancestor of all living organisms.Nearly all existing organisms perform glycolysis.Glycolysis occurs under anaerobic conditions.Glycolysis occurs only in the cytosol.

skill.text: 6.C: Provide reasoning to justify a claim by connecting evidence to biological theories.
